mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_quotation (quotationId, clientId, contactName, phone, location, startDate, endDate, isContainTax, isContainFreight) VALUES (#{quotationId}, #{client.clientId}, #{client.contactName}, #{client.phone}, #{client.location}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{isContainTax}, #{isContainFreight});
mapper.update: UPDATE t_quotation SET clientId=#{client.clientId}, contactName=#{client.contactName}, phone=#{client.phone}, location=#{client.location}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, isContainTax=#{isContainTax}, isContainFreight=#{isContainFreight} WHERE quotationId=#{quotationId}
mapper.select:
